about_the_game:
Description


The game is set in Guanajuato, Mexico. During select periods, the player controls Tressa, who is striving to lead a normal life. Explore a world where nothing seems real, use everything at your disposal to escape this twisted reality, uncover your past, present, and future, and reconnect with the deepest moments of your life.

Vein is a psychological horror game with a heavy focus on storytelling, set in Guanajuato, Mexico. Explore a world where every interaction has consequences, affecting both the environment and the player. The atmosphere will keep you on edge at all times.

Gameplay


Weapons may help you fend off the dreadful entities stalking you from every corner, door, or beneath your feet, but they are always lurking; such things cannot die. You’ll be able to pick up key items, interact with the environment, and search for objects that may help you escape this nightmare.

Storyline


Life is cruel. Tressa no longer knows what’s real. Once more, the past is calling to her. Explore a twisted world that can hunt you down, where every interaction has consequences. Witness the life of a marginalized person who is not fully aware of the reality surrounding her, in a world full of illusions, terror, and tragedy.

How


In Vein, you will witness firsthand how a horrific past can haunt you. Entities will follow your every move, watching you from every corner and stalking you from windows and streets. You will grapple with what’s real and what’s not as you discover your past, present, and future. Reconnect with the deepest moments of your life and escape from your nightmares to uncover the truth.

The World


Get lost in a twisted world that can amaze you with stunning graphics and a lot of bizarre situations, pulling you deeper into a life full of madness. The nightmares (dark entities) will play tricks on your mind and try to hunt you.

The Core Gameplay


  • Search everything (e.g., drawers)
  • Exploration with puzzle solving
  • Interact with the dark entities
  • Pick up key elements and interact with them (e.g., pick up a book and insert it into the drawer)
  • Interact with the environment (plants, photos, lights, etc.)

short_description: Cult -Vein- is a psychological horror game about post-cult trauma, featuring a girl who is striving to lead a normal life. Unravel the story behind her as you struggle to survive in a twisted world where every interaction has consequences.
